name: Mudkip's Dating Simulator 1+2
storyline:
On what appears to be an average day, Protagonist starts their first day at Pokémon High School. Shortly after, they meet new friends, and even a few love interests! But what is causing everyone to act aloof? Solve the mysterious... mystery(...?) of what's happening in this strange, strange plot...

Mudkip's Dating Simulator 1+2: Games of the Millennium Edition v1.4.3 has been released! Experience the game you've never heard of or care about like never before, with enhanced features, and more weird and genre-bending moments! Plus, more endings, all of which you can find with the built-in endings guide*!

*The Endings Guide unlocks after you have gotten at least one bad ending.
